text: Chinese people are the various ethnic groups from China, including Taiwan. The largest of these groups is the Han Chinese. This group is often called "Chinese" or "ethnic Chinese" in English.Who are the Chinese people? . Huayuqiao.org. Retrieved on 26 April 2013. Large numbers of Han Chinese live in countries other than China. They may make up as much as 19% of the world's population. Other ethnic groups in China include the Zhuang, Hui, Manchu, and Uyghurs, among many others. The People's Republic of China (PRC) officially recognises 56 ethnic groups. Taiwan (Republic of China, ROC) officially recognises 14 tribes of Taiwanese aborigines. The list of ethnic groups in China includes the major ethnic groups of China (PRC) and Taiwan. ==Related pages== * Chinese American * British Chinese * Chinese Canadian * List of Chinese scientists ==References==
title: Chinese people
